LanguageData.SK_Craftsmanship.label: 初级制造工艺
LanguageData.SK_Craftsmanship.description: You're not in stone age! Sit down and try to remember basics of your life before this catastrophe. Unlocks basic kitchen and production workbenches, some primal lightning and storages.
LanguageData.SK_Medicalcare.label: 医疗保健
LanguageData.SK_Medicalcare.description: New means to set up your medical area medieval style.
LanguageData.EnthalpicCooling.label: 冰石制冷器
LanguageData.EnthalpicCooling.description: Build an efficient passive cooling unit fueled coldstones.
